components.name: Footer
components.usageExample: <Footer />
components.description: A footer component for the application, containing navigation links and copyright information.
A header component for the application, including navigation, search bar, and mobile menu.
components.name: Header
components.usageExample: <Header />

components.name: NavigationSidebar
components.description: A sidebar component for navigation, including main links, unit links with descriptions and difficulty, and additional resources.
components.usageExample: <NavigationSidebar />

components.name: UnitSidebar
components.usageExample: <UnitSidebar unitNumber={1} unitTitle="Smart Ledger" sections={[]} />
components.description: A sidebar component for unit navigation and progress tracking, displaying sections and overall progress.

components.usageExample: <JournalEntry entryNumber="001" date="2025-07-31" description="Example Transaction" lines={[]} />
components.description: A component to display a journal entry, including lines, debits, credits, and validation for balance. It can also show accounting equation impact and transaction analysis.
components.name: JournalEntry
TAccountDetailed
components.usageExample: <TAccountDetailed accountName="Cash" accountType="asset" debits={[]} credits={[]} />
components.description: A detailed T-account component for visualizing debits and credits for a specific account, including beginning balance, running balance, and calculation formulas.

components.name: TAccountSimple
components.usageExample: <TAccountSimple accountName="Cash" accountType="asset" debits={[]} credits={[]} />
components.description: A simple T-account component for visualizing debits and credits for a specific account.

components.usageExample: <TrialBalance companyName="Example Co." periodEnding="2025-07-31" accounts={[]} />
components.name: TrialBalance
components.description: A component to display a trial balance, including account balances, validation for balance, and options for grouping and summary.
A financial simulation game where users manage a monthly budget, track expenses, and observe the impact of their decisions on savings and financial health.
components.name: BudgetBalancer
CashFlowChallenge
components.description: A business simulation game where users manage cash flow by balancing incoming and outgoing payments, making strategic decisions to avoid bankruptcy.

components.name: InventoryManager
components.description: A business simulation game where users manage inventory for a retail business, balancing demand, costs, and profit.
A business simulation game where users run a lemonade stand, learning about profit/loss, pricing strategy, inventory management, and the impact of external factors like weather.
components.name: LemonadeStand
StartupJourney
components.description: A business simulation game where users navigate the journey of a tech startup, making strategic decisions about funding, team, product, and growth.

components.name: BarChart
components.description: A reusable bar chart component for visualizing financial data, supporting multiple datasets and customizable options.
An interactive chart component for visualizing break-even analysis, allowing users to adjust fixed costs, variable cost rate, and selling price.
components.name: BreakEvenChart

components.description: A reusable doughnut chart component for visualizing proportional financial data, supporting customizable options and interactive segments.
components.name: DoughnutChart

components.description: A comprehensive financial dashboard component displaying key performance indicators (KPIs), revenue vs. expenses trend, account balances, cash flow, and profit margin analysis.
components.name: FinancialDashboard
LineChart
components.description: A reusable line chart component for visualizing financial data, supporting customizable options.

components.name: PieChart
components.description: A reusable pie chart component for visualizing proportional financial data, supporting customizable options and interactive segments.
A drag-and-drop exercise for categorizing business transactions into operating, investing, and financing activities.
components.name: BusinessTransactionCategorization
AccountCategorization
components.description: A drag-and-drop exercise for categorizing business accounts into Assets, Liabilities, Equity, Revenue, and Expenses, reinforcing the fundamental accounting equation.

components.name: BreakEvenComponents
components.description: A drag-and-drop exercise for categorizing business costs into fixed and variable, and then calculating break-even points.

components.name: CashFlowTimeline
components.description: A drag-and-drop exercise for visualizing and arranging cash flows on a timeline to understand cash management timing, working capital needs, and liquidity planning.

components.name: FinancialStatementMatching
components.description: A drag-and-drop exercise for categorizing financial statement line items into Income Statement, Balance Sheet, and Cash Flow Statement.

components.name: TrialBalanceSorting
components.description: A drag-and-drop exercise for organizing accounts into a trial balance format, understanding normal debit/credit balances, and verifying that total debits equal total credits.

components.name: ComprehensionCheck
components.description: A multiple-choice comprehension check component for testing understanding, with options for explanations and retries.

components.name: DragAndDrop
components.description: A versatile drag-and-drop matching exercise component for educational purposes, allowing users to match items from a left column to corresponding drop zones in a right column.

components.name: FillInTheBlank
components.description: A fill-in-the-blank exercise component for educational purposes, allowing users to complete sentences with missing words or phrases.
An interactive exercise for building journal entries, where users drag accounts and input amounts to create balanced entries for given business transactions.
components.name: JournalEntryBuilding

components.description: A detailed balance sheet component displaying assets, liabilities, and equity with sub-categories, calculations, and financial ratios.
components.name: BalanceSheetDetailed

components.description: A simplified balance sheet component displaying assets, liabilities, and equity, along with basic calculations and financial ratios.
components.name: BalanceSheetSimple
CashFlowStatementDetailed
components.description: A detailed cash flow statement component displaying cash flows from operating, investing, and financing activities, along with supplemental disclosures and analysis.
A simplified cash flow statement component displaying cash flows from operating, investing, and financing activities, along with a summary of cash changes.
components.name: CashFlowStatementSimple

components.description: A detailed income statement component displaying revenues, cost of goods sold, gross profit, operating expenses, operating income, non-operating items, income before taxes, income taxes, and net income.
components.name: IncomeStatementDetailed

components.description: A simplified income statement component displaying key revenue and expense figures, along with profitability metrics.
components.name: IncomeStatementSimple
SpreadsheetTemplates
components.description: A component that provides predefined spreadsheet templates for various business and accounting scenarios, including T-Accounts, Trial Balances, Income Statements, Statistical Analysis, Payroll, and Break-Even Analysis.
A component to display a detailed unit lesson plan for teachers, including objectives, assessment evidence, learning activities, and resources.
components.name: UnitLessonPlan

components.description: A component to display a high-level unit overview for teachers, including essential questions, learning targets, skills, key assessments, and connection to a capstone project.
components.name: UnitOverview
Badge
components.description: A small, customizable badge component for displaying short, important information, often used for status indicators or labels.

components.name: Button
components.description: A customizable button component with various styles and sizes, supporting different visual treatments and accessibility features.

components.name: Card
components.description: A flexible card component for grouping and displaying content, with distinct sections for header, title, description, content, and footer.
A utility component for creating customizable charts with Recharts, providing containers, tooltips, and legends.
components.name: Chart
Input
components.description: A customizable input component for text, numbers, and other input types, with various styling and accessibility features.

components.name: Label
components.description: A component for rendering accessible labels for form elements, enhancing usability and accessibility.
A WAI-ARIA compliant navigation menu component for building accessible and interactive navigation systems.
components.name: NavigationMenu
components.usageExample:
import { NavigationMenu, NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuLink } from '@/components/ui/navigation-menu'

export default function MyPage() {
  return (
    <NavigationMenu>
      <NavigationMenuList>
        <NavigationMenuItem>
          <NavigationMenuLink href="/">Home</NavigationMenuLink>
        </NavigationMenuItem>
        <NavigationMenuItem>
          <NavigationMenuLink href="/about">About</NavigationMenuLink>
        </NavigationMenuItem>
      </NavigationMenuList>
    </NavigationMenu>
  )
}

components.name: Progress
components.description: A customizable progress bar component to display the completion status of a task.
A visual separator component used to divide content or define sections, supporting horizontal and vertical orientations.
components.name: Separator
Sheet
components.usageExample:
import { Sheet, SheetTrigger, SheetContent, SheetHeader, SheetTitle, SheetDescription } from '@/components/ui/sheet'
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'

export default function MyPage() {
  return (
    <Sheet>
      <SheetTrigger asChild>
        <Button variant="outline">Open</Button>
      </SheetTrigger>
      <SheetContent>
        <SheetHeader>
          <SheetTitle>Edit Profile</SheetTitle>
          <SheetDescription>
            Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.
          </SheetDescription>
        </SheetHeader>
        {/* Your form goes here */}
      </SheetContent>
    </Sheet>
  )
}
components.description: A modal dialog that slides in from the edge of the screen, commonly used for sidebars or mobile menus.

components.name: Sidebar
components.usageExample:
import { Sidebar, SidebarProvider, SidebarHeader, SidebarContent, SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarMenuButton } from '@/components/ui/sidebar' import { Home, Settings } from 'lucide-react' export default function MyPage() { return (

My App

 Home Settings ) }
components.description: A comprehensive sidebar component with various sub-components for building flexible and responsive navigation layouts, including collapsible states, mobile support, and theming.

components.name: Skeleton
components.description: A visual placeholder component that displays a shimmering effect to indicate loading content.

components.name: Tooltip
components.usageExample:
import { Tooltip, TooltipTrigger, TooltipContent } from '@/components/ui/tooltip' import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' export default function MyPage() { return (

This is a tooltip

 ) }
components.description: A customizable tooltip component that displays informative text when a user hovers over or focuses on an element.

components.name: VideoPlayer
components.description: A component for embedding and displaying YouTube videos with an optional transcript, allowing users to load the video on demand and toggle transcript visibility.

components.name: AssessmentOverview
components.description: A component to display an overview of unit assessments, including a final performance task, key milestones, and a rubric preview.
A component to display a driving question for a unit, providing context and an optional scenario to engage students.
components.name: DrivingQuestion
LearningSequence
components.description: A component to display a unit's learning sequence, broken down by weeks and days, including focus areas, activities, resources, and milestones.

components.name: Prerequisites
components.description: A component to display prerequisites and required resources for a unit, including knowledge, technology, and downloadable materials, with optional differentiation strategies.

components.name: StudentChoices
components.description: A component to display options for student voice and choice within a unit, such as venture selection, team roles, and presentation formats.

components.name: UnitHeader
components.description: A header component for a unit, displaying the unit number, title, description, duration, and difficulty level.

components.name: UnitIntroduction
components.description: A component to display the introduction to a unit, including a driving question, introductory video, entry event, project overview, and learning objectives.

components.name: UnitOverview
components.description: A component to display a high-level overview of a unit's learning objectives, including content knowledge, skills, and final deliverables.
A comprehensive template component for displaying a unit's full content, including header, overview, driving question, assessments, learning sequence, student choices, and prerequisites.
components.name: UnitTemplate
ReflectionJournal
components.description: A component for student self-reflection on learning experiences, supporting the CAP (Courage, Adaptability, Persistence) framework used throughout the Grade 12 Business Operations curriculum. Students reflect on their learning journey and develop metacognitive awareness.
components.usageExample: <ReflectionJournal unitTitle="Unit 1 Reflection" prompts={customPrompts} onSave={handleSave} />
